attributes.action: Bring in the Army to regain control - this will free police up to gather evidence and arrest rioters
attributes.additional_details:
Bring in the Army to regain control and maintain calm on our streets.

The police would then be freed up to go through the thousands of hours of CCTV, gather evidence and go out to arrest the people who are wrecking our communities.

The sooner the gangs see their colleagues being arrested, charged and convicted the sooner they will stop and order will be reinstated!
